articles.author: Jasper Jolly
articles.title: Shell drops target to cut oil production as CEO aims for higher profits - The Guardian
articles.description: Wael Sawan prioritises shareholder payouts, setting out plan to keep oil production steady until 2030
articles.content: Shell has abandoned plans to cut oil production each year for the rest of the decade, in a shift in approach to firmly target fossil fuels and increase payouts to shareholders under its new chief exe… [+8359 chars]

articles.title: UK: Vodafone and Three announce intention to merge, creating the biggest operator - GSMArena.com
